name: Get the Key (Demo)
description:
Get the Key (Demo)

Is a single player puzzle game developed by 1 man.

The game is really short (if u can find all 4 keys)  and still needs some work here and there. The players job is to open the locked door in the house. But where is the keys? 

The only reason its on here is because i need feedback so i can make it better. So please leave a comment. 

I will try to update the game as much as possible. use the app https://itch.io/app too get the updates automaticly. 

Controls:
W Key: To walk forward 
S Key: To walk backwards
D Key: To walk to the right
A Key: To walk to the left
F Key: To toggle flashlight on/off
Esc Key: To Pause game 
use the mouse to look around

!!Only on Windows 64-bit!!
